item.title: BH CTF - Write up
item.description: Summary Blockharbor CTF Season 1 https://ctf.blockharbor.io dhjisgod (9th) [Figure 1] BHCTF ScoreBoard Challenges TBD (coming soon)

item.title: My talks at DEFCON31 Car Hacking Village
item.description: Summary On 10 August I gave a presentation on ‘Automotive USB Fuzzing’ at the Car Hacking Village at DEFCON in Las Vegas. The above topic is a presentation that describes the process of discovering USB vulnerabilities in real-world vehicles, including the CVE-2022-39075 and CVE-2022-39076 vulnerabilities, and how to effectively perform USB fuzzing in the vehicles we studied. See the following links for more information! DEFCON31-Automotive_USB_Fuzzing_RealWorld

item.title: Car Hacking Village at DEFCON31
item.description: Summary On the 10th, I participated in the Car Hacking Village CTF at the DEFCON hacking conference in Las Vegas as a member of Autocrypt, which consisted of a total of 13 people. We secured a commendable 4th place finish in the competition. Special thanks to @uberwoozle for organizing this event. We also had a presentation at this year’s Car Hacking Village on “AUTOMOTIVE USB FUZZING: HOW TO FUZZING USB IN VEHICLES TO DISCOVER THE REAL-WORLD VULNERABILITIES”.

item.title: GM Equinox Automotive Infotainment Vulnerability
item.description: CVE-2023-39076 PoC for vulnerability in General Motors Automotive Infortainment System Summary This is a proof of concept for CVE-2023-39076, which allows a USB attack on the infotainment system in General Motors vehicles. This could allow an attacker to crash the infotainment system. Affected GM Chevrolet Equinox 2021 (at version, 2021.03.26 build ver) DEMO Copyright Donghyeon Jeong / dhje0ng(at)naver.com

item.title: Renault ZOE Automotive Infotainment Vulnerability
item.description: CVE-2023-39075 PoC for vulnerability in Renault Automotive Infortainment System Summary This is a proof of concept for CVE-2023-39075, which allows a USB attack on the infotainment system in Renault vehicles. This could allow an attacker to crash the infotainment system. Affected Renault ZOE EV 2021 (at versions, 283C35202R ~ 283C35519R) DEMO Copyright Donghyeon Jeong / dhje0ng(at)naver.com

item.title: Volkswagen Jetta Automotive Infotainment Vulnerability
item.description: Information Vehicle model : Volkswagen Jetta 2021 Hardware version : 724 Software version : 0876 Summary We analyzed the vulnerabilities in the infotainment system of Volkswagen Jetta vehicle and found a USB memory vulnerability that caused the infotainment to crash. Analysis TBD (No plans to go public yet.) Impact This attack could allow an attacker to abnormally shut down the vehicle’s infotainment system (resulting in an internal crash). DEMO Copyright Donghyeon Jeong / dhje0ng(at)naver.

item.title: Awarded a bounty of $500 for BMW Automotive
item.description: Summary In recent months, we previously conducted a vehicle vulnerability analysis for BMW Automotive. This vulnerability is a service crash vulnerability, which could result in a potential denial of service. [Figure 1] BMW Automotive Awarded a bounty of 500$ [Figure 2] BMW GROUP HALL OF FAME

item.title: AGL (Automotive Grade Linux) Platform
item.description: Summary [사진 1] AGL Overview AGL (Automotive Grade Linux) OS란? https://www.automotivelinux.org/about/members/ 전 세계 차량 OEM 들과 협력하에 개발되고 있는 인포테인먼트 시스템이다. AGL은 IVI(In Vehicle Infortainment) 시장을 목표로 하고 있다. AGL 개발 자체는 오픈소스 프로젝트로 진행되며 AGL 이외에도 대표적으로 GENIVI 라는 플랫폼도 존재하는데 두 회사 모두 IVI S/W 개발 환경을 제공하여 다른 차량 OEM 회사들이 IVI 시스템을 쉽게 개발할 수 있도록 하는 목적을 가진다. [사진 2] AGL/GENIVI Overview [사진 3] AGL Core AGL OS 에 올라가는 코어 부분의 구성도이다.

item.title: Car Instrument Cluster Simulator
item.description: Summary 최근 자동차 해킹에 대한 소재가 많이 떠오르고 있다. 때문에 자동차 보안에 대해서도 관심을 가지시는 분들이 많을 것 같다고 생각을 하고 있다. 이번 글에서는 자동차에 들어가는 주요 통신 프로토콜 중 하나인 CAN 프로토콜이 어떤건지, 그리고 자동차의 계기판을 시뮬레이터로 만들어둔 도구를 하나 소개할 것이다. (이 도구를 통해서 CAN 통신이 어떻게 이루어지는지를 간단하게 공부해볼 수 있다) CAN Protocol Controller Area Network 의 약자로, 차량 내에서 Host PC 없이 Controller 또는 Device간 통신을 주고 받기 위해 사용하는 자동차 표준 통신 규격이다.
